title: Need a logo, etc.
content:
I don’t know if this shouldn’t go here so I apologize if this is not the place for this.

I am a Master’s Student at SC and developed a project as part of my thesis. I need to find a great graphics designer that can assist in creating a corporate image. I need a really good deal on the price, as well.

email me at [hr@avintel.com](mailto:hr@avintel.com)

I’ll give you all the details and hopefully this can be done easily.

 [‹ (Chinese) Cultural Revolution typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203253/http:/typophile.com/node/50438 "Go to previous forum topic") [Kerning help for newbie. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203253/http:/typophile.com/node/50338 "Go to next forum topic")
author: avintel

comments.content: Does your school have a art/design program?

absolutely. it is where i got all of the work done for the thesis. but as was commented previously on the logo’s, i think it is necessary that i look into professional work as i would like to turn this into an actual working company. let me know if anyone is interested in helping.

Hi Avintel,  
Can you give us more details about your project?  
Thanks
